text: is a Japanese politician. He was the Minister of the Environment from 2019 until 2021. He has also been a Member of the House of Representatives for the Liberal Democratic Party since 2009. He is the second son of former Prime Minister Junichirō Koizumi. In January 2020, Koizumi received international news attention when he announced his plans to take two weeks of paternity leave when his first child was born. In September 2024, Koizumi announced his candidacy for the Liberal Democratic leadership election to replace Prime Minister Fumio Kishida. He lost the election to former Defense Minister Shigeru Ishiba on 27 September 2024. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Kanagawa Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Environment ministers of Japan
